pkgmetadata.longdescription: VITA, IG and PLSIM Simulation for Given Covariance and Marginals // User specifies population covariance matrix. Marginal information may be fully specified, for which the package implements the VITA (VIne-To-Anything) algorithm. Groenneberg and Foldnes (2017) doi:10.1007/s11336-017-9569-6. Alternatively, marginal skewness and kurtosis may be specified, for which the package implements the IG (independent generator) and PLSIM (piecewise linear) algorithms. Foldnes and Olsson (2016) doi:10.1080/00273171.2015.1133274. Foldnes and Groenneberg (2021).
